title: From These Ashes
description: All Aerika Zairi has left of her family is a band of perfect diamonds and an inherited vendetta.Scarred by the deaths of her family and the attack that left her fighting for her life, Aerika heads to an island retreat for rest and healing. She finds neither. Arrested on arrival, Aerika is interrogated by an insane alien "Admiral" convinced she’s part of some otherworld rebellion. When wild accusations are levelled against her family and secrets are revealed, Aerika finds herself thrust into the middle of a brutal war she doesn’t understand. Now, she must escape before the Admiral realizes she doesn’t have the answers he seeks and completes his mission: kill her.
author: Melisa R. Hightower
